publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4443 Alasdair Morgan: Referendum on Independence—That the Parliament welcomes the introduction at Westminster of the Scotland (Petitions for a Referendum on Independence) Bill. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4443 Alasdair Morgan: Referendum on Independence—That the Parliament welcomes the introduction at Westminster of the Scotland (Petitions for a Referendum on Independence) Bill. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Rob Gibson*, Stewart Stevenson*, Richard Lochhead*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fergus Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*, Patrick Harvie*, Jim Mather*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S2M-4443 Referendum on Independence (lodged on 24 May 2006) Chris Ballance*, Bruce Crawford*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr John Swinney*, Christine Grahame*, Shona Robison*
